level_1.skillDescription:
Rains down arrows at the designated spot
Continuously damages enemies within the skill's effective area

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases skill's effective area and skill power

level_3.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 3rd stage
Charging to higher stages increases skill's effective area and skill power

abilities.skillDescription: Reduces the skill's effective area but increases skill power
Reduces the time required to reach max charge
